channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:20 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:20 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Follow further reports. #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 11:00 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
